text: Franz Caucig, Franco Caucig or Francesco Caucig, also known in Slovene as Franc Kavčič or Frančišek Caucig (4 December 1755, Gorizia – 17 November, 1828, Vienna) was an Italian painter. He was born on December 4 1755 in Gorizia. His father Andrew was a tailor, of the Volče family, originally from Tolmino. His mother was Catherine Kaknes (Cacnos). == Related pages == *Ideal Landscape with a Young Man Killing a Snake * List of Italian painters ==References== Category:1755 births Category:1828 deaths Category:Italian painters
title: Franz Caucig
